about_the_game:
Space Blade
Dynamic game that revives the spirit of classic titles like "Space Invader" by incorporating modern elements and inspirations from recent popular productions. Players assume the role of a space pilot tasked with annihilating cosmic pirates and aliens. Here's what we've improved upon compared to the classic model:

Arcade Action with a Refreshed Look
The game retains the straightforward yet engaging mechanics of shooting down enemies hovering on the screen, reminiscent of classic "Shoot em up" titles. The visual design bursts with colors and lighting effects, reminiscent of arcade cabinet games but presented in a modern style

Combat
The game launches with 4 stages, each featuring a unique set of adversaries. Each enemy type possesses distinct movement patterns and attacks, demanding players to showcase good coordination, quick reactions, and an understanding of the stronger foes' tactics. After each stage, players face formidable bosses, requiring specific approaches and skills.

Power-ups and Upgrades
Players can acquire various power-ups, helpful equipment, rocket ammunition, and diverse weaponry. On their journey, players encounter a variety of shops offering randomly generated cards with statistics, enhancements and aides.

Exploration


Players traverse through diverse space locations. Each offers a unique appearance and adversaries, sustaining the gameplay's freshness. Along the path, besides adversaries, players encounter various events and hazards, providing opportunities to earn extra rewards.

Progression


Enhance your capabilities by purchasing upgrades and new spacecrafts between attempts using earned experience.

Space Blade merges the essence of classic games with popular mechanics that enhance replayability, crafting a distinctive experience for players who seek a touch of nostalgia while being more approachable than traditional titles.
